abstract: Piraeus Bank, Greece’s largest lender, is planning to issue a bond that will be a significant test of investor interest.
snippet: Piraeus Bank, Greece’s largest lender, is planning to issue a bond that will be a significant test of investor interest.
lead_paragraph: ATHENS — Piraeus Bank, Greece’s largest lender, is set to became the first Greek bank to tap the capital markets since the euro zone crisis erupted five years ago.

headline.main: Greek Bank Set to Be First in 5 Years to Tap Capital Markets
